website_summaries.verdict: A decent pick for smaller aquariums; it has more to offer in the way of looks than usefulness for most tanks.
pros: Natural-looking, colorful artificial plant with soft leaves that make it a good choice for small and delicate fish like Bettas
We love its sturdy weighted base that keeps it in place
cons: A few owners expected it to be larger, while others complained that their fish paid no attention to it

customer_reviews.title: Soft Leaves, But Green Vines Can Scratch Betta Scales
customer_reviews.text: Great little plant, but the green vines that protrude from the base are pretty stiff and can scratch the scales of your betta. My betta loves to chill on the leaves, or under them, by the base, and he sometimes gets scratches on his scales from swimming against them. The leaves are soft and look nice, but unfortunately, the green vines just don’t do it for my betta. I tried cutting the vines, but the severed ends are also pretty scratchy, so I removed the decoration all together. Disappointed that I couldn’t keep it in my tank.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Chung

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but the betta needed new decor.
customer_reviews.text: It is small and just right for the betta bowl. It is pretty. The leaves are soft and pliable. I must say, compared to the actual image, there are fewer leaves on the one I received. Minus one star because of that. The plant also clouded the water somewhat and required several water changes. Upped it one star as soon as my betta stopped staring at it as if it was a foreign invader. He seems happy as a clam so far.
customer_reviews.author: FogNamedKarl

customer_reviews.title: For the price .. I'm disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these ..1 is perfect the other is missing half of the leaves. That's something that should have been caught while processing the order especially since 2 were in the order..it's obvious seeing 2 side by side that they are not the same. Annoying to get poor service like that just because someone didn't pay attention to what they were doing 😏 because other wise I really like this plant .
customer_reviews.author: C. Welter

customer_reviews.title: Looks good with some cutting
customer_reviews.text: Plant looks really nice in my 1.1 gallon half moon tank with Squidward's Easter Island home but I had to cut off all of the fake green roots because they did not look and were sharp and sticking out dangerously. I also cut out the center barbs where more leaves could be attached because they also were pointy and there was no need to keep them. I was also satisfied with the size, it may not be very tall but it is wide and has 12 very soft good sized leaves. Overall with some cutting it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Nova90

customer_reviews.title: Soft to keep your Betta safe
customer_reviews.text: This plant is unbeatable because of its SOFTNESS, thereby preventing any injuries to my very delicate Bettas. What is typically sold in pet stores (hard plastic decorative items for tanks) can absolutely damage the delicate fins of Bettas, so I ONLY use plants that are extremely soft to the touch, like this one. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Devika Seth

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different plant.....this is awful.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this "plant" today and almost fainted when I opened the package. This plant is only 2 inches across and 3 inches high. For $6 it is a rip off and it's flimsy. How 76% of buyers gave this 5 Stars is mind-boggling. Do not buy this plant. Terrible. A Betta needs a way bigger plant with nice wide leaves so he can hide and rest on.
customer_reviews.author: The Guardian

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my aquarium
customer_reviews.text: The multi colored leaves are perfect to add color and they look real as long as you don't look at them too close. I recommend you clear the gravel, or whatever you use on the bottom of your aquarium and place them in the clear space. Move your gravel back around the base to give an better natural look.
customer_reviews.author: Dena.

customer_reviews.title: Fish likes it
customer_reviews.text: It took some time for my Betta to like it, but now it's his favorite place. He likes to sleep in the space created by the leaves or rest on top of them. The leaves are a very soft fabric and do not injure his scales. It's easy to clean and still looks new after several months. Would recommend this for Betta owners. I bury the rock-like base and plastic "roots" in the gravel at the bottom of the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Default User

customer_reviews.title: Reevaluation.
customer_reviews.text: Now that I’ve put the Blue Potted Berta Plant in the tank it is magnified by the water. This is my first experience with a fish tank. I still think leaves are missing though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We gave 2 bettas and they LOVE THEM. They can rest on them or under ...
customer_reviews.text: We gave 2 bettas and they LOVE THEM. They can rest on them or under them, as we say they are in the shade! Great plant, planning on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Finally

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: The leaves are soft and do not hurt my betta's fins, which I feel is most important-- however, I feel it's a bit overpriced for a) the size of the plant (about as big as my palm) and b) the quality, given the fact that it came missing one leaf, and another fell off as I took it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: not 5" tall, more like 3" once in the tank
customer_reviews.text: Whoever measured this plant as being 5" tall needs a new tape measure. While stretching the highest leaf it totaled 3.5". After placing this in the tank, pushed into the ricks just enough to stay in place, with the leaves floating naturally, it just barely measures 3". While this looks quite unproportionate, my betta does enjoy resting under the wide leaves.
customer_reviews.author: B.C.

customer_reviews.title: So glad I got this for my little betta Dash
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got this for my little betta Dash. Dash never went near the other plant, but I switched it with this, and put it near the side hold of the little log we have. Dash loves to go under the leaves and actually sleeps under them. I think it's really made Dash happier!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Doesn't Bother My Betta Fins
customer_reviews.text: My Betta (Khaire) Loves this plant. It was the perfect size for my 1.5gal Cube tank. I just wanted to add something to his tank so he'd stop trying to fit behind the filter. It worked. At first, he didn't mess with the plant. After 2 days he started laying on it and hiding behind it. His fins hasn't been damaged at all and he swims through the leaves frequently. I'll post a picture when I can catch him not paying attention, as he always swims out as soon as he sees me (I think he thinks he's about to eat every time I come in to the room). But I love the plant.
customer_reviews.author: K. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful small plant
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and softness. Don't think it'll rip up his fins.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie

customer_reviews.title: Best plant!
customer_reviews.text: My beta absolutely LOVES this plant. He sleeps in it and rests in it. It was a very great buy. He seems much happier in his tank now
customer_reviews.author: Peperomiapink9

customer_reviews.title: The beta seems to like it!
customer_reviews.text: The beta fish seems to like this item. He swims around it and hides under the leaves occasionally. I don't have any complaints. It is easy to deal with when I clean the bowl. It shipped quickly from when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Pretty plant but mybetta doesn’t lay around on it like previous plant. Looks nice in tank.
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty in the fish tank
customer_reviews.text: I like what I purchased for my fish tank. It is colorful! I like that the leaves are silk and not harmful for my fish. It's small but ok just the same.
customer_reviews.author: Pegge O

customer_reviews.title: Looks good in Betta tank.
customer_reviews.text: Silk plant worked good in our Betta tank. The colors are great to add some variety from the basic green. Betta fish likes to hide behind it or in it and doesn't seem to hurt his fins. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LuigiTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Fish love a low
customer_reviews.text: Fish love a low, full plant that they can hide behind at times and this plant sure serves that purpose. It is pretty too.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine A. Pribble

customer_reviews.title: It's not the best quality. But is as discribed.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to have sharp plastic on the base. It also looks like 3 leaves were cut off. I think it is kind of pricey for what I got. Next time I will support my local pet store. Never know what you are going to get in the mail!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Betta loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: The product was more than satisfying. I expected it to be small as it had said in previous reviews but was still slightly surprised at how tiny it was. Great addition to the tank and betta always lounges underneath the leaves. Recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: My fish seems to like it. I often find him hiding underneath the ...
customer_reviews.text: My fish seems to like it. I often find him hiding underneath the leaves so I think it does make him feel safe and comfortable. I'll probably get a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice little aquarium plant
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to my betas bowl he loves all of his various plants & hiding spots!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen g.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, natural looking.
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable little plant, and my betta as well as my ghost shrimp love to hang out under it. It looks natural, and is so cute that I'll get another one when it wears out. Can't beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Randi C. Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!....my little guy loves this plant. I enjoy watching him lay on the leaves, or lay under them as a hideaway.
customer_reviews.author: Miasolo

customer_reviews.title: My Betta loves this
customer_reviews.text: I have the 1.1gal tank and two of these fit just right. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: S. D. Morgan deVries

customer_reviews.title: betta loves it!
customer_reviews.text: my betta loves it. seems to be missing some leaves.
customer_reviews.author: mama m

customer_reviews.title: Pic is very glorified view of what you'll actually be receiving.
customer_reviews.text: Item received didn't look at all like the picture. There were probably a dozen posts to connect the leaves, however the item I received only had 4 leaves, leaving 8 of the posts empty. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The second I put this in my Betta's tank, he swam right over and hid in it. It is a lot smaller than I thought it would be, but looks great in the tank!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Z

customer_reviews.title: great for small tanks
customer_reviews.text: This is small, great for small tanks. No missing leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Nan K

customer_reviews.title: It's a plant. It fits perfectly into a small ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a plant. It fits perfectly into a small betta aquarium. My betta loves sleeping under it and resting on the petals.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Fish on a skewer
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. All the green stems have sharp bits to them. Kept only 2 to hold the leaves in place. Cut the rest off and filed it down
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For A One Gallon Tank
customer_reviews.text: Works very well in my one gallon betta tanks. I was worried they would be too big, but they are smaller than described and perfect. Very soft for their fishy fins too.
customer_reviews.author: AVT

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE PLANT
customer_reviews.text: WOW PERFECT!! My Betta used to swim around in his tank but since adding this to his tank he is usually in the plant resting. He obviously just Loves it and hangs out in there all day. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Nice small silk aquatic plant
customer_reviews.text: Nice for small tanks or as foreground plants. Great rounded edges for protecting betta fins.
customer_reviews.author: tcgrey

customer_reviews.title: Betta Plant
customer_reviews.text: We use this plant in our betta tank. It looks great! The leaves are soft enough that it doesn't tear our Betta's fins
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Pretty for my Betta
customer_reviews.text: These are silk or silk-like leaves so they will not harm the fish's scales or fins. It seems very well made and am quite pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: pandag

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: My little "sally" the male betta loves this. Easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Lawlor

customer_reviews.title: Good value, nice plant
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice plant! I prefer silk plants because they look less "fake" than plastic. Our betta fish likes to sleep on the leaves.
customer_reviews.author: moto_librarian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: NICE, A LITTLE SMALL, BUT ITS MADE FOR BETAS SO ITS OK, WE LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.author: Jamie D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great. It gives my beta fish a place hide
customer_reviews.author: Ferrell Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: I always check reviews before ordering
customer_reviews.text: I liked it allot and am using it for a bettas tank. Looks really nice in there.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Koenig

customer_reviews.title: I returned this... was way to small ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this...was way to small and served no purpose...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My betta's tank looks cuter with this in it, but she ignores it. She prefers her leaf hammock.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Saathoff

customer_reviews.title: Very nice small plants that add some color
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these for betta tanks. Very nice small plants that add some color. Bettas love them and very soft leaves so no worries of fin damage.
customer_reviews.author: the mama J

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition
customer_reviews.text: This is well made and looks nice in a small tank
customer_reviews.author: G. R. Baxter

customer_reviews.title: High quality product. Very pretty too.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Smooth, silky plant. It looks very pretty in my betta tank. Substantial weight and no sharp edges. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Garden Lady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice but much smaller than I anticipated for the price. My Beta likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and pretty plant for betta
customer_reviews.text: My betta loves the plant, hides under the leaves, swims through them. Perfect size for small fish. Leaves are very soft and he seems to know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its good quality and pretty but its way way smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Aquarium plant
customer_reviews.text: My first order came to me damage...but the seller got me straighten out...my beta is happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Blue Spotted Betta Plant Red Anubias Leaf, Great for Betta Fish
product_meta.description: The Blue Spotted Fire & Ice Betta Plant is a natural looking betta plant, ideal for any bowl or tank, great for your pet Betta! It provides enjoyment for your Betta and yourself as you relax watching your pet explore and use the plant, and has a resin weighted rock base, keeping in place, in your bowl or aquarium. Place in front, middle or rear position, creating a place to explore or hiding int for your pet Betta, and helping to build paradise for your pet. Add the Blue Spotted Amazon Sword Betta plant and Elephant Leaf Betta plant to enrich the setting.
feature_bullets: Create a beautiful bowl or aquarium with ease, using Blue Spotted Red Anubias Betta plant, ideal for any bowl or tank, and great for your pet Betta!
The Blue Spotted Red Anubias Betta plant has a resin weighted rock base, keeping in place, in your bowl or aquarium.
Rinse with cool-running water after removing from package.
Place in front, middle or rear position, creating a place to explore or hiding int for your pet Betta, and helping to build paradise for your pet.

The Blue Spotted Red Anubias Anubias Betta plant provides enjoyment for your Betta and yourself as you relax watching your pet explore and use the plant. Add the Blue Spotted Amazon Sword Betta plant and Elephant Leaf Betta plant to enrich the setting.
